english: There are more and more milk tea shops now.

chinese: 人们发现奶茶里有很多咖啡因了。
english: People have discovered that there is a lot of caffeine in milk tea.
possible_solutions: 人们发现了奶茶里有很多咖啡因。
人们发现奶茶里有很多咖啡因了。

chinese: 他检查了十种最有名的奶茶。
english: He checked ten of the most famous milk teas.
possible_solutions: 他检查了十种最有名的奶茶。
他检查了最有名的十种奶茶。
最有名的十种奶茶他检查了。

english: I bought a cup of milk tea.

chinese: 我们喝了奶茶去看电影吧？
english: Shall we go watch a movie after drinking milk tea?
possible_solutions: 喝了奶茶我们去看电影吧？
我们喝了奶茶去看电影吧？
